manifest.name: Segment
manifest.description: Receive Events from Segment, send updated data to Segment

private_settings.name: sending_hero
private_settings.title: Important Note
private_settings.headerTemplate: **Users can only be send to segment.com when at least one identifier is present, this can be either the `External ID` or one or more `Anonymous IDs`.**

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Skips Users who don't belong to any of these segments
private_settings.description: Sends everyone if empty.

private_settings.name: synchronized_properties
private_settings.title: Send Attributes to Segment.com
private_settings.description: Only sends list of user segments as 'hull_segments' attribute if empty.

private_settings.name: send_events
private_settings.title: Send Events to Segment.com
private_settings.description: Sends everything if empty

private_settings.name: forward_events
private_settings.title: Allow forwarding events received from Segment.com
private_settings.description: Do NOT enable if Segment.com source and destination are the same. It could result in duplicates

settings.name: write_key
settings.title: Write Key
settings.description: Segment Write Key, found in Project Settings > Keys

settings.name: handle_pages
settings.title: Handle Pages
settings.description: Store analytics.page() events. Can generate a lot of volume

settings.name: handle_screens
settings.title: Handle Screens
settings.description: Store analytics.screen() events. Can generate a lot of volume

settings.name: public_id_field
settings.title: Public ID Field
settings.description: User field to use as the userId field for data sent to segment

settings.name: handle_groups
settings.title: Handle Groups
settings.description: Handle group attributes as user traits, prefixed with 'group/'

settings.name: handle_accounts
settings.title: Handle Accounts
settings.description: Handle group attributes as account traits

manifest.name: Optimizely
manifest.description: Send Hull Segments as Optimizely audiences, use it to personalize for each customer

manifest.name: Salesforce
manifest.description: Send Users as Leads or Contacts to Salesforce with custom mappings

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Filter users
private_settings.description: Only send Users matching one or more of these segments. Sends everyone if empty.

private_settings.name: leads_mapping
private_settings.title: List of Lead fields to push to Salesforce

private_settings.name: fetch_lead_fields
private_settings.title: List of Lead fields to fetch from Salesforce

private_settings.name: contacts_mapping
private_settings.title: List of Contact fields to push to Salesforce

private_settings.name: fetch_contact_fields
private_settings.title: List of Contact fields to fetch from Salesforce

manifest.name: Slack
manifest.description: Notify a Slack Channel whenever a User enters or leaves a Segment

private_settings.name: actions
private_settings.title: Add Action Buttons to update User attributes on click

manifest.name: Instagram
manifest.description: Store Instagram new picture as Hull Events

manifest.name: Clearbit
manifest.description: Fetch additional customer data from Clearbit

private_settings.name: api_key
private_settings.title: Clearbit API Key
private_settings.description: Get it from https://dashboard.clearbit.com/keys

private_settings.name: enrich_info
private_settings.title: Enrichment
private_settings.description: The Enrichment API lets you look up person and company data based on an email or domain

private_settings.name: enrich_enabled
private_settings.title: Enable Enrichment
private_settings.description: Enrich users with their user and company information

private_settings.name: enrich_segments
private_settings.title: Enrich users only if they match any of these segments

private_settings.name: reveal_enabled
private_settings.title: Enable Reveal
private_settings.description: Reveal anonymous visitors' company information

private_settings.name: reveal_information
private_settings.description: Reveal setup
private_settings.headerTemplate: For Reveal to operate, you need to enable **Guest Users** from your [Dashboard Settings](../../settings)

private_settings.name: reveal_prospect_min_contacts
private_settings.title: Minimum distinct anonymous visitors from a company to trigger prospection

private_settings.name: discovery_info
private_settings.title: Discovery
private_settings.description: The Discovery API lets you search for companies that are similar to your existing customers.

private_settings.name: discover_enabled
private_settings.title: Enable Discovery
private_settings.description: Search for companies similar to the ones you are interested in

private_settings.name: discover_segments
private_settings.title: Search for companies similar to users who match any of these segments

private_settings.name: discover_limit_count
private_settings.title: Maximum number of companies to fetch

private_settings.name: prospect_enabled
private_settings.title: Enable Prospector
private_settings.description: Search for people in companies you Revealed or Discovered

private_settings.name: handle_accounts
private_settings.title: Handle Accounts
private_settings.description: Save account objects instead of user objects in the clearbit_company group

private_settings.name: prospect_segments
private_settings.title: Automatically fetch prospects for companies who match any of these segments

private_settings.name: prospect_limit_count
private_settings.title: Maximum number of prospects to fetch per company

manifest.name: Facebook Audiences
manifest.description: Send Hull Segments to Facebook Custom audiences

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Segments
private_settings.description: Sync to Facebook these segments.

private_settings.name: matching_fields
private_settings.title: Matching Fields
private_settings.description: The fields which are sent to custom audiences to build matching.

manifest.name: Datanyze
manifest.description: Fetch additional customer data from Datanyze

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Filtered Segments
private_settings.description: Only send if user matches one of these segments. Empty sends no one.

private_settings.name: target_trait
private_settings.title: Domain Lookup Field
private_settings.description: Choose which field to use to lookup a domain name

private_settings.name: excluded_domains
private_settings.title: Domain Excludes
private_settings.description: Domains to exclude from fetching. Comma Separated

private_settings.name: token
private_settings.title: Datanyze Token
private_settings.description: Datanyze Token

private_settings.name: username
private_settings.title: Datanyze Username
private_settings.description: Datanyze Username or Email

manifest.name: Nutshell
manifest.description: Send Users as Leads or Contacts to Nutshell with custom mappings

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Filter users
private_settings.description: Only send users who match these segments to Segment.com. Keep empty to send everyone.

is_required.title: Is required
is_required.description: Skip sync if this field is not defined

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Filtered Segments
private_settings.description: Only sync users in at least one these segments (Empty to send everyone)

private_settings.name: mailchimp_list_id
private_settings.title: Mailchimp List ID
private_settings.description: Mailchimp List ID selected by user

private_settings.name: mailchimp_list_name
private_settings.title: Mailchimp List Name
private_settings.description: Mailchimp List Name selected by user

private_settings.name: api_key
private_settings.title: API Key
private_settings.description: Token or API Key

private_settings.name: api_endpoint
private_settings.title: API Endpoint
private_settings.description: Mailchimp API endpoint

private_settings.name: domain
private_settings.title: API Domain
private_settings.description: Mailchimp API Domain

private_settings.name: sync_fields_to_mailchimp
private_settings.title: List of User attributes to push to Mailchimp

manifest.name: Processor
manifest.description: Recompute custom properties and emit events with Javascript logic whenever a user is updated

private_settings.name: sentry_dsn
private_settings.title: Sentry DSN
private_settings.description: URL of a sentry instance to collect logs and exception notifications

private_settings.name: code
private_settings.title: Code
private_settings.description: Enter Javascript code here, It will receive the data in the middle column, can emit `track()` and `traits()`. Preview results on the right. Save when finished

manifest.name: Hubspot
manifest.description: Sync a Hubspot Channel whenever a User enters or leaves a Segment

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Segments
private_settings.description: Post to Hubspot when users match these segments (Empty to send everyone)

private_settings.name: last_fetch_started_at
private_settings.description: Last time fetched at operation was started

private_settings.name: fetch_count
private_settings.description: Count of contacts already fetched from Hubspot

manifest.name: Intercom
manifest.description: Sync Leads and Users in Intercom with Hull

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Segments
private_settings.description: Post to Intercom when users match these segments

private_settings.name: last_fetch_started_at
private_settings.description: Last time fetched at operation was started

private_settings.name: fetch_count
private_settings.description: Count of contacts already fetched from Intercom

private_settings.name: send_events_enabled
private_settings.title: Enable sending events
private_settings.description: Allow sending events to Intercom

private_settings.name: send_events
private_settings.title: Events to send
private_settings.description: Send following Events to Intercom. Empty sends nothing.

private_settings.name: sync_fields_to_intercom
private_settings.title: List of User attributes to push to Intercom

private_settings.name: sync_fields_to_hull
private_settings.title: List of User custom attributes to fetch from Intercom

manifest.name: SQL Importer
manifest.description: Import data from your SQL databases

private_settings.name: overwrite
private_settings.title: Use SQL value in case of data conflict

private_settings.name: import_days
private_settings.title: Incremental Queries - Start Date (x days ago)
private_settings.description: Enter the number of days and the connector will make a variable called 'import_start_date' available to your query that allows you to run incremental queries. If your SQL query does not use this variable at all, this setting has no effect.

private_settings.name: db_host
private_settings.title: Host Name
private_settings.description: The public host name of your database server.

private_settings.name: db_port
private_settings.title: Port
private_settings.description: Default ports: MySql: 3306, PostgreSQL: 5432, MS SQL: 1433

private_settings.name: db_options
private_settings.title: Additional connection options
private_settings.description: Add connection options for the different database types. See below for more details.

private_settings.name: db_options_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
***MySql and Postgres***
Specify options as plain text in the format `ssl=true`.

***MS SQL***
Specify a valid JSON object like `{"encrypt": true}`. Please refer to the [tedious driver documentation](http://tediousjs.github.io/tedious/api-connection.html#function_newConnection) for available options.
**Important Note for SQL Azure**: SQL Azure requires the option encrypt to be set to true which is not the default. Please specify `{"encrypt": true}` in the options otherwise the connection will be refused.

private_settings.name: db_login_hero
private_settings.headerTemplate:
***Security Recommendation***
We recommend to grant the user below read-only access to dedicated tables to keep your information safe. Please refer to the manual of your database server for additional security recommendations.

private_settings.name: api_key
private_settings.title: Typeform API key
private_settings.description: Click on "My Account" and you will find your key at the bottom of the page.

private_settings.name: question_as_email
private_settings.title: Select the field matching the user email
private_settings.description: You can only pick fields of type email

private_settings.name: sync_answers_to_hull
private_settings.title: List of form questions to save into Hull
private_settings.description: Date fields should be saved to traits ending with _date suffix

manifest.name: Stripe
manifest.description: Collect Stripe Charges and Subscription events

private_settings.name: id_parameter
private_settings.title: Hull user ID which the metadata param would be matched to

private_settings.name: metadata_id_parameter
private_settings.title: Metadata parameter to match user id

manifest.name: Webhooks
manifest.description: Send Hull Users updates as Webhooks

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Filtered Segments
private_settings.description: Global filter. Only send if user matches one of these segments

manifest.name: Browser Personalization
manifest.description: Get access to whitelisted attributes and segments from the Browser in realtime

settings.name: script
settings.title: Code to be run everytime user is updated

private_settings.name: whitelisted_domains
private_settings.title: Domains from which access will be allowed

private_settings.name: synchronized_segments
private_settings.title: Only users from these segments will be sent to the browser

private_settings.name: public_segments
private_settings.title: Segment names that will be sent
